review: This is one exelent stratigy game.Even though it is a 4x and real time but it can get very stressful at times.You are always wanting bigger and better ships all the time but then you have to think 'is there alot of up keep for these?'Because if there is you econamy will fall and so will your empire.It is like Star Wars and Star Citizen mashed to gether but still differentStill I would highly recomend his game and it dose take alot of skill and planingthxHope you get this game Armyninja48
